mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISITOR ( VISIT_IP, VISIT_TIME, VISIT_REFER, VISIT_AGENT ) VALUES ( #{visitIp}, NOW(), #{visitRefer}, #{visitAgent} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, ip, userAgent, created_at FROM visit_record WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT VISIT_REFER , COUNT(VISIT_REFER) AS urlCount FROM VISITOR v GROUP BY VISIT_REFER ORDER BY urlCount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT VISIT_IP , COUNT(VISIT_IP) AS IPCount FROM visitor v GROUP BY VISIT_IP ORDER BY IPCount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DATE(VISIT_TIME) AS visitTimeToDate , COUNT(VISIT_TIME) AS visitDateCount FROM visitor v GROUP BY DATE(VISIT_TIME) LIMIT 5
